content.question:
Let f be a function such that f ″( x ) = 6 x + 8.

(a) Find <math> </math> f ( x ) if the graph of f is tangent to the line <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>3</mn> <mi>x</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo>−</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>y</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo>=</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DE8@</annotation> </semantics> </math> at the point <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo> ( </mo> <mrow> <mn> 0 </mn> <mo> , </mo> <mo> − </mo> <mn> 2 </mn> </mrow> <mo> ) </mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> .

frqParts.text:
Let f be a function such that f ″( x ) = 6 x + 8.

(a) Find <math> </math> f ( x ) if the graph of f is tangent to the line <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>3</mn> <mi>x</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo>−</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <mi>y</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo>=</mo> <mtext> </mtext> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DE8@</annotation> </semantics> </math> at the point <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo> ( </mo> <mrow> <mn> 0 </mn> <mo> , </mo> <mo> − </mo> <mn> 2 </mn> </mrow> <mo> ) </mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> .

(b) Find the average value of f ( x ) on the closed interval <math> <mrow> <mrow> <mo> [ </mo> <mrow> <mo> − </mo> <mn> 1 </mn> <mo> , </mo> <mn> 1 </mn> </mrow> <mo> ] </mo> </mrow> </mrow> </math> .
